text: Munofiqon ʙim dorand, ki [maʙodo] surae dar ʙorai onon [ʙar pajomʙar] nozil şavad va onon [ mu'minon]-ro az onci dar dilhoi eşon [munofiqon] ast, ogoh sozad. [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigū: «[Harci mexohed] Masxara kuned, [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo onciro, ki [az on meparhezed va] haros dored, ifşo xohad kard»
